Package model

Class Appointments

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Appointments
  • public class Appointments
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used as a value object for Appointments and provides POJO functions to handle and manage appointments. The appointments are added to an observable arraylist from the database.

    • Field Summary

      • confirmStart

        public static boolean confirmStart​(int customerID,
                                   int appointID,
                                   java.lang.String t)
        This method is used to confirm that the customer does not have an overlapping appointment
        Parameters:
        customerID - the ID of the customer
        appointID - the appointment ID used to make sure it is not the same appointment
        t - the startTime of the appointment
        Returns:
        boolean value

      • confirmEnd

        public static boolean confirmEnd​(int i,
                                 int appointID,
                                 java.lang.String t)
        This method is used to confirm that the customer does not have an overlapping appointment
        Parameters:
        i - Id of the customer
        appointID - appointment ID to verify it is not the same appointment
        t - the endTime of the appointment
        Returns:
        boolean value

      • checkUserAppointments

        public static Appointments checkUserAppointments​(int id)
        This method is used to check if a user has any appointments within 15 minutes their login
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the user
        Returns:
        appointments if found, else null;
